body: Aguachile reports: "In a joint communique, MVS Radio and Carmen Aristegui announced that the journalist will be back at the radio station the coming Jan. 21" and wonders "if we'll ever know more about what led to her dismissal: Was any pressure coming from the presidential office of Felipe Calder贸n, or was this simply an independent decision by the company?" You can learn more about Aristegui's case in a post by Ernesto Priego.

title: Mexico: Journalist Carmen Aristegui to Return to MVS Radio

sentence: Aguachile reports: "In a joint communique, MVS Radio and Carmen Aristegui announced that the journalist will be back at the radio station the coming Jan. 21" and wonders "if we'll ever know more about what led to her dismissal: Was any pressure coming from the presidential office of Felipe Calder贸n, or was this simply an independent decision by the company?"
You can learn more about Aristegui's case in a post by Ernesto Priego.
